instructions: Open your device's Settings app . Select Accessibility , then TalkBack . Select Settings , then Gestures . Select the gesture to which you want to assign a new action. Note : If your Android device has a fingerprint sensor, you can use fingerprint gestures with TalkBack. Select the action that you want to assign to the gesture. Along with the actions listed in the tables above, you can assign the following actions to gestures: Open Quick Settings Read from top Read from next item Show actions Editing Languages Perform click
